column1: short of a length and some shape into off stump. Allows it come on and dabs with soft hands in front of point
length on leg stump, stays back and clips it through square leg off the back foot
full and just outside off, no swing back this time, just angle. Watches it carefully and taps to point on the front foot
good length inswinger starts on leg and curves further down. Early exercise for Bairstow
short of a length and slanting across the corridor, left alone
short of a length and angled across off, left alone
some wobble for Broad outside off. Good length and skidding through nicely just outside off. Left alone
short of a length and just outside off. Left alone
short of a length on off stump, defended off the back foot
beats him. That's a great line, he's hit it consistently. Just outside off, draws him forward for the angle and gets it to cut past the outside edge
short and wide outside off, left alone
length and in at off stump, drops it into the pitch with a closed face
length ball slanted across the corridor, left alone
short of a length and wide outside off, left alone
length ball angled across off, stays in the crease and brings the bat down tentatively. It runs to midwicket off the inside edge
length ball and pushed across off stump, left alone

inwinger from Anderson. The old set-up. But doesn't get the line right once again. Starts on middle and swings into the pad. Dhawan can't get bat on this attempted glance but India get the run off his thigh
short of a length in the corridor, left alone
outswinger short and wide outside off, left alone
short of a length wide outside off, no shape away this time Left alone
length ball with some shape away, defended into the off side off the front foot

past the outside edge. That was close. His instinct is to play at the best of times, let alone when Broad forces him with the angle from around the wicket. This swings late and his jab against the rising ball in the corridor looks loose
short of a length and swinging away outside off, left alone
beaten on the inside edge this time! Superb from Broad. Dhawan has been beaten on both edges from the same line. This one slants back in and he's in two minds. Preparing to leave but it comes back in
full on leg stump, tapped into the leg side with soft hands
beaten on the outside edge. Length ball pushed across off stump, jabs at it and can't get connection on it
length ball. Inswinger, into the pads. Easy for Dhawan. Allows it to come on and dabs it fine
length ball wide outside off, left alone
length on of stump, blocked on the front foot
thick edge over the slips. Short of a length and cramping him just outside off with some shape away. He slashes at it and gets it to clear fourth slip
leans in nicely and transfers his weight into it. Tad away from the body as he drives this outswinger, but he played it late and opened the face at the right time. Stokes gives chase but he's beaten
short of a length on off stump, gets deep in the crease and taps it with soft hands in front of mid-off
length ball swinging away wide outside off, left alone
short of a length just outside off, pokes it into the off side off the back foot
full outswinger, wide outside off. Left alone
length ball just outside off, pushed into the leg side off the back foot. An exaggerated shuffle from Dhawan there. Trying to get behind the line that had him in trouble last time he faced Broad
length ball swung away from the corridor. Left alone on the back foot
climbs past the outside edge. Looks to defend this outswinger on the back foot but he's not behind the line
short of a length outside off, left alone
wide of the crease but can't get the batsman to play on the angle. It's too short and too wide. Swings away, left alone
back close to the crease, but still a tad too wide. Short of a length and swung away, left alone
beaten. Lovely away curving ball from off. Gets forward to defend and is done by the movement
short of a length and slanted into the corridor. Left alone
length ball swinging away, wide outside off, left alone
withdraws the bat and lets it go. Outswinger from a length, wide outside off
shuffles and whips to fine leg. No fielder there, he's at deep backward square. This angles in and Dhawan is there early. On his toes and quick hands to get it down there
short of a length just outside off, defended into the off side off the back foot
squeezes one to the fine leg boundary again. Shuffles and nearly gets caught out with the front leg coming across off stump, but he manages to get bat in time
full outswinger outside off, left alone
short and wide outside off, left alone
short of a length on off stump, defended solidly off the back foot
short of a length and wide outside off, left alone
short of a length and in at leg stump, pushed into the leg side with soft hands to steal a single from mid-on
short of a length and wide outside off, left alone
drags this from way outside off with a pull. Peculiar shot. Short and wide, there for the hammering through cover. He rolls his wrists and gets it down to deep backward square
whack. Short and wide outside off and Dhawan stands tall and slaps it to the cover boundary
short of a length on leg stump, deflected into the square leg region off the thigh guard
short of a length and in at off stump. Defended off the back foot
length ball in at off stump, solidly forward and smart to play with soft hands. Gets a single at cover
short of a length in the corridor, defended into the covers with soft hands
length ball with marginal shape away in the corridor. Defended on the front foot
jags back as he looks to leave this. He's withdrawn the bat behind his front pad. The ball has run into the slips off the face
short and wide outside off, left alone
length ball angled in at middle stump, poked in front of square leg off the front foot
short of a length in the corridor, pushed to cover off the back foot
length ball swung away outside off, left alone
length ball wide outside off, plants the front leg forward and hides the bat behind it to allow this to go
short and very wide outside off. Stays tall and crunches it through extra cover. That's come on very very slowly
length ball wide outside off, left alone
short of a length and wide outside off, left alone
length and just outside off. Jabs at it on the front foot, gets it wide of mid-on off the inside half
short of a length and angled into him. Gets an inside edge onto front thigh as he looks to defend. Dhawan calls for the run and beats Stokes on the sprint
full outswinger that starts from middle. Keeps his shape and allows it to swing before offering the full face
short and outside off, nicely behind for the cut. Finds backward point on the bounce
short and wide outside off, left alone
short and very wide outside off, left alone
length ball swung away wide outside off, left alone
short of a length with shape away in the corridor, left alone
beaten on the inside edge as he leans in to try and flick this length ball from off stump
short and shaping away outside off, opens the face and runs it to backward point
inswinger but a little too short to trouble him. Manages to get glove on it and turn it behind square leg from a length
good length inswinger from wide outside off, defended solidly on the front foot
another big inswinger. Into the pads from back of a length, he defends solidly towards midwicket
overpitched outswinger, very wide outside off. Left alone
short of a length on off stump, defended off the back foot
past the outside edge. Short of a length and angled across the corridor. Hangs his bat outside and is beaten
short and slanted wide outside off, hangs the bat inside the line and lets it pass
length and onto the pads. Tickled to fine leg off the back foot
swipes and misses. Loose attempt at a cut. Short ball outside off keeps a touch low, but it was a nervous shot
length ball outside off, gets forward to cover off stump and leaves
fuller than a good length and simply floats through outside off, Dhawan doesn't bite yet. Left alone
Stokes draws the outside edge but it does not carry to third slip. Good length and slanting away outside off against the angle, Dhawan employs soft hands and prods it to the left of third slip
back of a length on a set of stumps outside off - or even wider - Dhawan shelves the big drive and lets it go again
short, wide, outside off, begging on its knees to be clattered away. Dhawan obliges, rocks back and cuts it to the right of a diving short cover
pitched further up and outside off, Dhawan presses forward and drives through the line to mid-off
back of a length and shoved down leg, Dhawan aims a pull and collects only fresh air
delicious drive from Rahul. Pitched up and swinging away outside off, Rahul leans into it, shows off his high elbow, and creams a drive through the covers
full and angling in at off, shapes away slightly, Rahul pokes and edges it past the cordon for four
back of a length on a fifth-stump line outside off, Rahul shoulders arms
wide of the crease, full and angling into the pads, inside-edged to square leg
back of a length on middle and leg, tucks up Dhawan for room. He sits back and jabs the ball away to the leg side
Dhawan jumps back, gets on top of a short ball outside off and punches on the up to the covers
short and climbs further outside off, no shot from Rahul
back of a length and pushed wider outside off, Rahul does not go after it again
short and angling in at off stump, Rahul has ample time to skip on the back foot and dab it to the off side
much fuller and closer to off, but does not threaten off, so Rahul swishes his bat away
Stokes dangles the bait outside off, again, Rahul bites this time and gets away. Throws his hands at a short ball outside off and flashes it over the cordon for a streaky four

oooooh, how did that miss off stump? Stokes ventures wide of the crease, and gets it to swing back in viciously and threaten off. Rahul's feet are static as he hangs his bat inside the line and is beaten. It wasn't too far away from the off stump either
short and angling away wide outside off, ignored
floated fuller and wider outside off, left alone again
back of a length and angling away just a shade outside off, well left alone again

edged and taken at second slip. Woakes finds the outside edge and the breakthrough for England. Good length and slanting away outside off with the angle from over the wicket, Dhawan is squared up as he jabs with hard hands and snicks it behind to Buttler
back of a length on a fourth-stump line, Pujara cautiously rides the bounce and dabs with soft hands to the cordon
full and outside off, pushed through the covers
good length and outside off, Pujara leaves it be
short and zips away outside off, Pujara presses forward, protects his off stump, and lets it go again
full and angling into the pads, neatly picked off fine of long leg for four
dug in short on off, 133ks, although it looked quicker than that, Pujara stabs it away
big inswinginer from Stokes, from wide of the crease, pretty full, Pujara stabs it out again, this time to the leg side
Bairstow neatly takes this in front of his head. Bursts from a back of a length outside off and thuds into the gloves of the keeper as Pujara lets it go
good length, angling in, then seaming away, Rahul plays late, plays with soft hands, ensuring it does not carry to second or third slip. Nicely done
good length and holds its line outside off, left alone in the channel
good length, angling in towards off, then zipping away late, beaten
back of a length and holds its line outside off, left alone
full and wobbles through outside off, left alone

Woakes pins Rahul in the crease with an inswinger. He has been given out leg before by umpire Erasmus. Rahul tucks his bat in and walks off. Pujara then chats with him, and Rahul eventually calls for a review. Is this heading down leg? Length ball, big inswinger from Woakes, catches Rahul in the crease, he plays around it and is rapped on the back pad. Ball-tracking suggests it would crash into leg stump. Woakes takes out both the Indian openers after a solid start. After testing Rahul with five balls that moved away or held its line outside off, Woakes brings this one back in and nabs Rahul. Top bowling from Woakes. India lose Rahul and a review
rising short ball outside off, fended off
back of a length and outside off, ignored
very full and straight, forward and flicked out to midwicket

back of a length and drifting down the leg side, past the reach of Pujara, past the reach of the diving keeper as well. Bairstow got his left glove to the ball, but it still dribbled away to the fence
short and bounces outside off, no shot
overpitched and outside off, Pujara opens the face and shovel-drives it in the gap at cover-point
good length and outside off, ignored
full and outside off, wobbles away, ignored

a bit too full and outside off, Pujara presses forward and smoothly drives the ball through the covers. Not much of a follow-through but the timing is exquisite, as is the placement. Stroked to the left of short cover
Woakes shortens his length outside off, forces Pujara back, rides it out to the cordon
back of a length and holds its line outside off, left alone
back of a length, angling in, and nipping away outside off, left alone again
Kohli reaches out for his first ball and is beaten outside off. Fuller than a good length, angling in, then swinging away. Draws Kohli forward and teases his outside edge
full inswinger, forward and inside-edged to short midwicket
back of a length and slanting in on middle, worked away to the leg side off the back foot
back of a length and outside off, Pujara leans back, rides the bounce, and steers the ball through the covers. Pujara's control % of 100 remains intact after 21 balls
back of a length and angling into a back-foot punch towards short cover
huuuuuge inswinger from Broad! Bring out the oh-my-Broad expression. Well, not quite. Good length, angling in, snaking in visiously, beats Pujara's inside edge and bounces over leg stump
good length and swings away against the angle, Kohli tightens and lets it pass
full and straight, Kohli happily flicks it through the gap at midwicket
back of a length and holds its line outside off, left alone by Pujara
full and outside off, left alone again
full, angling in towards off, then swinging away, Pujara reads it well and shoulders arms
rolls through to the diving keeper. Full, angling in, and shaping away, left alone

another big inswinger from Broad, Kohli is struck on the front pad below the knee-roll. But impact is outside the line of off. Not given out lbw. Broad and England challenge the on-field not-out decision. It stays not out. Gee, Broad is getting these to hoop back in
back of a length on a fourth-stump line outside off, no shot
back of a length and skidding in, Broad has Kohli falling over the flick now and pings the thigh
back of a length and bounces through the channel, Kohli has nothing to do with it
Kohli gets his front foot across the line and works this inswinger to short midwicket
full and wide outside off - wider than a set of stumps outside off - Kohli still chases it for nothing. Carved away to point. What a risky shot for no runs
wide of the crease, angling into a back-foot defence to short midwicket
full and just a shade outside off, Pujara judges it well and lets it go
good length on middle, Pujara carefully blocks to the leg side

Oh, Pujara holes out at the stroke of lunch. Chest-high short ball on middle, Pujara takes it on with an uncharacteristic hook, as opposed to swaying away or ducking under it, he can't keep it down and hits it straight down the throat of Rashid at long leg. He had swivelled on the back foot and hit the ball a bit too early
short of a length and angled in at off. Cuts away too but Rahane solidly behind it to defend
full outswinger just outside off, left alone
length ball at off stump, blocked solidly on the front foot
length on off stump, defended down the pitch off the front foot
in control. Short of a length ball outside off, shuffles to get behind it and opens the face to run it past third slip with soft hands
beaten. Seam-up and landing in the corridor. Jags away as he looks to defend on the back foot
short of a length on off stump, defended off the back foot
cops it on the body as this one climbs up from a length. He was looking to press forward outside off
short of a length and banged in at off stump. Shapes away a touch. Run into the slips with soft hands
length outside off, blocked with a big front foot stride
full and swung away outside off, left alone
nicely timed. Short of a length ball on the pads and he waits late before nudging this through square leg
short of a length outside off, pushed into the off side off the back foot
length ball angled in at the corridor. Gets forward to leave
short of a length outside off, gets forward to defend and chops it into the pitch
oh lovely shot, but Stokes won't give him runs at point. Overpitched ball shaping away from him. He opens the face late after a front foot stride. Stokes dives to his left and saves
length ball swung in at off stump. Gets closer to the ball this time and opens the face again. This time he gets it to Stokes' left
inswinger fired down leg side. Looks to whip it but that's swung viciously. Bairstow flies to his left to gather one-handed
well timed again. Length ball outside off, allows it to skid on and nudges it wide of mid-on
thick outside edge rolls through to third slip. Gets forward to defend an outswinger that's quite wide
length ball hooping away from wide outside off. Left alone
well played. Full outswinger on off stump, almost yorker length. Allows it to get in his area and gently taps it between bowler and mid-off
short of a length on off stump, defended off the back foot
misfield at square leg. Looks like Anderson. Yes, he's cleaning up at the boundary now. Length ball onto the pads was tapped straight to him. He was late on getting down
full outswinger on off stump, pushed straight to cover. Not happy with himself. That was driving length for him
length and in at leg stump. Tapped through square leg with a closed face
outside edge falls short of third slip. Hard-handed jab at a rising length ball outside off
length ball on off stump, defended into the off side
length ball on off stump, blocked on the front foot off the bat-pad
length on off stump, pad across into the off side and a late flick of the wrists to get this wide of mid-on
short ball in the corridor, nicely on top of it to defend into the covers
length ball outside off, defended solidly on the front foot
looks to flick from off stump. Rattled on the back thigh. This is length and in at off
length ball curved away from the corridor. Left alone
length ball on leg stump. Can't get bat on the flick but his deflection off the thigh brings India their hundred

leading edge safely out to the wide third man boundary. That's a brilliant delivery from Woakes. Angles it into middle and leg from wide of the crease, gets it to straighten. Rahane has already closed the face on the flick but this bisects fourth slip and backward point comfortably
shout for lbw but that's going down. Length ball strikes him in front of leg stump but that hasn't straightened. Off the thigh guard down to fine leg
struck in front but that was probably going high. England won't review this lbw decision. Slanted in from a length and the extra bounce saves Kohli who is beaten on the inside edge once again
length ball wide outside off, left alone
short of a length on off stump, defended off the back foot
full on off stump, gently nudged to mid-off from the crease
length ball swung away wide outside off, left alone
well left. That climbs steeply outside off as he gets forward to defend. Does well to get the bat out of the way
length ball on off stump, blocked on the front foot

shot. If we bats long, we'll see a lot of this from Kohli. Short stride, posibbly because of his back issues, but he has drilled that on the up through extra cover. Length ball swung away from wide outside off
short of a length outswinger from the corridor, left alone
length ball angled in at middle stump. Wacthful push into the leg side
yorker length at middle stump, gets the front leg out of the way and jams it into the leg side
well left. This comes in with the angle in the corridor. But he's covered off stump to let it pass
length ball wide outside off, left alone
bouncer wide outside off. Thinks of the hook but it's gone too far away for him
short of a length outside off, bit of an away-from-the-body poke this time. Opened face, angled bat, can't get it past point
outside edge past Jennings who is in close with a helmet at third slip. It still falls short to his right. Rahane plays with soft hands as this rises up from short of a length
short of a length at middle stump, thick inside edge through square leg
full ball wide outside off, jammed into the covers
short of a length and wide outside off, left alone
length ball curving away in the corridor, left alone
that's expertly done. Good stride, gets close to the ball, bat close to body and a high elbow as Rahane meets this outswinger outside off and caresses it wide of mid-off
length on off stump, blocked into the covers with a step down the pitch
length ball jumps away from outside off, left alone
length outside off, zips away and he follows with his hands. Opens the face and gets it wide of third slip
short of a length outside off, defended off the back foot

aerial but safe. Rahane not in control but he picks up four. It's not a cut, it isn't a back foot drive. Something halfway - a stab away from the body while he's still in the air trying to get on top of this. Short ball from Stokes outside off, but that wasn't convincing from the batsman
short of a length outside off, dropped into the point region with soft hands
short of a length outside off, pokes through point
length ball in at middle and leg. Solidly defended with a straight bat
short of a length and cramping him at the hips. Forces it behind square with the bottom hand off
easy. A full toss on off stump and anyone from this batting order, despite their demons, would have put that away. Kohli picks midwicket and he sends it there
inside edge onto pad. Stays back to a length ball in the corridor
length outside off, left alone
length on off, defended from the crease
short of a length at of stump, defneded off the back foot
length on off stump, poked to point off the back foot
short of a length on leg stump, pushed to square leg off the back foot
length on off stump, well forward to block
dropped short on middle stump, gets deep in the crease and whips it to deep square's left
short on middle stump, punched to mid-on off the back foot

that's woeful. For all the beauty they can produce, no one quite does half-trackers as badly as legspinners. This one is on the pads, dug in shorter than bouncer length. Kohli gets back and whips to fine leg
tossed up outside off, left alone
creamed. Floated right up, wide outside off. Gets to the pitch and beats sweeper cover easily to his right
overpitched on the pads nicely clipped to the square leg boundary. Class from Rahane. Plays that so late
beaten. Straightens in the corridor as Rahane gets forward to defend with hard hands
length and slanted into the corridor. Gets behind it and defends with soft hands
length on leg stump, pings off the inside half as he looks to defend on the front foot. Trickles teasingly to fine leg's left
full outside off, left alone
short of a length just outside off, defended into the covers off the back foot
non-turner outside off, left alone
looped up full and outside off, Kohli drives with the wrists and finds deep cover
shorter and sliding into the pads, Rahane whips it away to deep square leg off the back foot
back of a length and breaks away outside off, Rahane jumps back and slaps it away to the left of deep cover
tossed on off, not much turn, Rahane stretches out to smother it
on a length on off, defended off the front foot again
inswinger from Anderson, Kohli gets his front pad outside the line and gets struck on the front pad. Replays detect an inside edge
pitched up and outside off, patted to the covers off the front foot
full and straight, forward and flicked to midwicket
good length and outside off, Kohli stretches out, manipulates the bat-face and drives it in the gap at point for four
good-length inswinger, teases the off stump, Kohli knows it won't come back enough to kiss off. Left alone
full and curving in, Kohli gets his front pad outside the line and takes it on the pad. Impact outside the line again
floats a legbreak up outside off, Rahane presses forward and eases a single to sweeper cover
dangled up on off, driven to the covers off the front foot
full on middle, dead-batted away
opens the face and drives a full ball to cover
fuller and outside off, Kohli leans into another drive and strokes it straight to the covers
dragged short on middle, Kohli goes on the back foot and whips a single to deep midwicket
good length and slanting in on middle, Rahane shuffles across off and drops the ball to the leg side
back of a length on a fourth-stump line, Rahane gets right behind it and blocks stoutly to cover
Rahane opens the face and glides this length ball to the left of backward point
good length on off, Rahane gets right forward and defends to cover
back of a length on off, Rahane opens the face and steers the ball quietly to backward point
full and angling into a front-foot drive to mid-on
full on off, Kohli stays leg-side of the ball and laces a single to sweeper cover
tossed outside off, Rahane stretches out and flat-bats the ball away to the right of sweeper
dragged down on off, keeps a bit low. Rahane goes back, adjusts to the lack of bounce, and punches back to Rashid
tosses it up outside off and gets it to spin away, left alone
full on off, front-foot defensive from Rahane
Rahane reads this legbreak and lets it go outside off
Kohli gets inside the line of this length ball on middle and clips a single to deep square leg
good length just a shade outside off, tapped to the covers off the front foot
back of a length and angling into a gentle little push back to Anderson
back of a length and outside off, jabbed to point off the back foot
good length on a fourth-stump line, blocked off the front foot
shorter on off, Rahane camps back and stabs it to the covers
on a length and breaks away outside off, driven fluently to sweeper off the front foot
much fuller and outside off, eased through the covers again, this time by Rahane
half-tracker, finishes outside leg, Kohli rocks back and pummels it away behind square for four
dangled up wide outside off, spins away further, left alone
full on off, pressed to the covers
full and outside off, stretches out and drives with the wrists square on the off side for a couple of runs. Positive running from Kohli and Rahane
good length and angling into off stump, Rahane deploys a strong stride and deals with it
back of a length on off, defensively dropped to the off side off the back foot
just short of a good length and outside off, Rahane meets it with an open face and handsomely punches past cover's left
shortish and outside off, Rahane rides it out to backward point
similar ball from Anderson, similar short, steered to backward point
good length and outside off, Rahane shoulders arms and rounds out the over
back of a length and outside off, the old ball isn't moving, Kohli reaches out and punches through point to bring up his fifty. He raises his bat and a hug from Rahane is part of the celebrations
back of a length and on a fourth-stump line, Rahane gets on top of it and jabs the ball to the covers
short on the hips, tucked away to deep square leg
pitched up and outside off, driven to deep-ish mid-off
full and outside off, opens the face and secures a single to point
spits up from a length on off, hits the splice and rolls to the cordon
back of a length and outside off, Kohli loosens his grip and fends it back to Anderson
back of a length and outside off, opens the face and pats the ball to the covers
full and outside off, driven to the covers off the back foot
full on the stumps, shuffles across and blocks to the leg side
good length on off, shuffles across again, this time he pushes to mid-on
back of a length and outside off, left alone
short, wide, Rahane gets on top of it and flays it away to bring up a fifty of his own. Crunched through the cover-point region
short, wide, again, laced to the covers
full outswinger, Rahane watches it through to the keeper
fullish and outside off, no shot
back of a length and bounces through the channel, Rahane shoulders arms again
full and wobbles away outside off, Rahane keeps leaving these
short and outside off, Kohli swivels on the back foot and drags to deep midwicket
lifter outside off, Kohli ducks under it
another short ball outside off, tempts Kohli into a hook and sails over his head
short and outside off, Kohli sways his upper body out of the way and lets it go
short and rises outside off, Kohli rises with it, aims to ramp it over the cordon. Beaten in the end
bouncer outside off, umpire Erasmus calls it a wide and has a word with Stokes
Kohli hops and tucks a back of a length ball to midwicket
short on off, Rahane hops and fends to cover
full and straight, turned to midwicket
full and nibbles away late outside off, Rahane leaves it be
Rahane plays with soft hands and guides it to the cordon
full on off, defended to the covers off the front foot
full-toss on middle, driven back, the bowler gets a hand onto it and deflects it towards long-on
short and outside off, Rahane swats it away like a fly to backward square leg
short and outside off, Rahane drops his gloves and lets it thud into the gloves of YJB
bouncer on off, Rahane has his eyes locked on the ball before sinking under it
short and ducks back in, Rahane aims to evade it, the ball hits his back instead and runs away to fine leg
Rahane jumps to get on top of a short ball outside off and jab it away through backward point
back of a length and moving away outside off, Kohli lets it pass
full and angling into a solid push to mid-on off the front foot
full and angling into off, Rahane presses forward, meets the pitch, opens the face and dabs to point
dug in short and outside off, Rahane swerves out of the way
glanced off the pads to long leg
wide of the crease, banged down leg, Kohli leaves it, the ball skips away fine past a tumbling YJB
short on off, Kohli rides the bounce and fends it off to short leg
oh glorious. Overpitched ball just outside off, nicely to the pitch of it to punch wide of mid-off
length outside off, left alone
short of a length at middle stump, defended off the back foot
length ball just outside off, defended into the covers
short of a length just outside off, defended off the back foot
short of a length outside off, left alone
leading edge as this rises on Kohli. He's looking to turn the corridor ball into the leg side
short of a length in the corridor, defended off the back foot
length ball bending away from wide outside off, left alone
leading edge again. Short of a length and curving away from off. Looks to whip it leg side and it ends up at cover
length ball wide outside off, left alone

dropped! A difficult chance at point for Anderson. Woakes drops it short outside off and Rahane slaps it viciously off the back foot. It's a few feet above Anderson and he leaps one-handed but can't hold on. The ball was above his right shoulder and he went left-handed (remember Collingwood?)
length on off stump, punched to mid-off
short of a length outside off, punched to deep point off the back foot
outside edge between second and third slip. A loose drive from Rahane. Angled bat, half-stride and looking to go leg side at an off stump ball. Because third slip is close in, this squeezes through
short of a length outside off, left alone
full on off stump, punched back down the pitch
short and wide outside off, cut to deep point
short of a length outside off, comes on slowly as he looks to push through the covers. It's into square leg off the inside half
in the air but short of extra cover. Length ball curves away and he looks to drive on the up. We've said it earlier, this is slow-ish pitch. Both batsmen have been deceived by it this over
length outside off, more controlled push to extra cove this time
length ball in the corridor, shaping away, left alone

nudges it past third slip and the luck continues to elude Anderson. This time he sprints across from deep backward point, puts in a slide to his left and seems to have done it all. But his attempted flick back meets his fingers and the ball rolls into him as he slides into the boundary padding. Kohli was in control of that length ball outside off
short of a length outside off, bunted to deep point
length on off stump, tapped to extra cover off the front foot
beaten. Angles in, gets him to play outside off, slides it past the outside edge
length and in at off stump, defended off the front foot
overpitched just outside off, driven firmly to extra cover
length ball just outside off, some late wobble. Left alone
beaten. Sensational legcutter, rising sharply as Kohli looks to poke at it
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
short of a length outside off, nudged into the covers off the back foot
hammered through cover. Aerial again but well in front of square. Short and wide outside off, no attempt to keep the cut down
short of a length outside off, nudged to point off the back foot
full ball just outside off, toe-ended drive to extra cover
short of a length outside off, left alone
back of a length and on off, Kohli shuffles across a touch and clips to midwicket
full and wobbles away outside off, Kohli presses forward and shoulders arms
good length and angling into a push towards mid-off
full and angling into off, Kohli shuffles across again and whips it with the wrists through midwicket. A tumbling save in the deep keeps it to two
pitched up and angling in on of, Kohli presses forward and drives to mid-off
good length and slanting in at off stump, draws Kohli forward, draws the inside edge, the ball rolls away to the leg side
back of a length and angling in, Rahane flicks early and watches a leading edge land in front of cover
short and ducks back in just outside off, cramps the batsman for room. Rahane hops and jabs to the cordon
wide of the crease, full and nipping in on off, defended
short on leg stump, Rahane swivels on the back foot and middles a pull to fine leg
Kohli gets inside the line of this length ball on middle and clips it away to deep square leg
good length and holds its line outside off, Rahane pulls his bat out of the way
back of a length and around off, Kohli gets forward and taps to cover
good length and outside off, punchily played up to the covers
banged in short on middle, it's Kohli's turn to swivel and pull it away. He places it fine of long leg for four
fuller and outside off, swings away further, Kohli lets it go
Kohli twirls his wrists and flicks a length ball to deep square after getting inside the line
on a length on off, blocked off the front foot
near yorker on off, shovelled away to the right of mid-on for three. Positive running from Kohli and Rahane
short on leg or outside leg, Rahane sizes it up and swats it away to the fine leg boundary. Is Woakes tiring?
good length and angling into middle, Rahane drops it to the leg side for one
pitched up on off or just a shade outside off, Kohli leans into it and drives it languidly straight of mid-off. Right out of the coaching manual
fuller and outside off, slices a drive wide of mid-off. That's the 150 stand
back of a length and outside off, Rahane steps forward and utterly batters it away through the cover-point region. Bam!
short and outside off, gets on top of it and punches with a high elbow to mid-off
short and angling into the hips, tucked to deep square leg
on a length and on off, forward and driven to the covers
back of a length and outside off, stabbed to the covers, where Stokes gets into a side-on position and lets the ball burst through his hands
short on middle, nurdled away into the vacant spaces at midwicket

Cook sticks his left hand out and plucks a one-hander at first slip. Great reflexes. England, finally, find a way past this pair. This was pitched up and seams away a wee bit outside off, Rahane's front foot is nowhere close to the pitch. He reaches out for the ball with his hands, drives loosely, and nicks it off. He kept going after such balls in the previous over and got away. This time he falls
back of a length and wide outside off, Kohli shows more vigilance outside off and leaves
short and wide outside off, chopped away to point
Kohli gets on top of a short ball outside off sweetly punches through the covers
pitched up and outside off, opens the face and drives to sweeper
full and straight, whipped away to deep square leg
back of a length and wide outside off, no shot
full on off, pushed to the covers
full on middle, shuffles across and whisks it away to mid-on
back of a length on off, opens the face and runs it away to the covers
a bit too full on off, Hardik stretches out and drives it firmly to the right of mid-on for four
Hardik shuffles across and drops a length ball to the leg side
back of a length and swerves back in, close to off, well-judged leave by Pandya
full and outside off, opens the face and guides a single through point
full and outside off, ignored
full and angling in, seams away, catches the outside edge and rolls to the cordon
back of a length and keeps low on off, Pandya adjusts and jams it down
back of a length and zipping through the corridor, no shot
back of a length and nips away outside off, Pandya drags his bat inside the line and lets it go
back of a length and straying into the hips, easy peasy, clipped fine on the leg side for four. The man in the deep is square
full nip-backer, Kohli once again gets his front pad outside the line and is beaten on the inside edge
full and slanting in, Kohli thrusts his pad outside the line and misses it again
full and nipping down the leg side, beats the bat, beats the diving YJB, and skips away to the fence
full and outside off, squeezes a drive to mid-off's right
whipped off the pads to deep square for another couple of runs
full on middle stump, flicked to mid-on
length ball wide outside off, left alone
late swing away from a length on off stump. jabs with hard hands and gets a thick outside edge to point
length ball wide outside off, hangs the bat inside the line and is beaten
length ball hooping into the pads. Leans into the off side and pokes to midwicket
mistimed but he's got enough to find the extra cover boundary. Length ball outside off and he doesn't get the pitch so ends up slicing it on the up. Rolls wide of mid-off and beats him
short of a length on off stump, defended down the pitch off the back foot
guides it past the slip cordon. Short of a length just outside off, allows it to come on and opens the face late. Plays with soft hands
hooks to Rashid's left at deep square. Bouncer is picked easily by Kohli who swivels and gets into this
length ball on middle stump, punched back down the pitch. Stokes dives and parries it to mid-on as Pandya lunges back into the crease
length outside off, driven on the up to extra cover
length ball outside off, left alone
length on middle stump. Slides on with the angle and catches the inside half as Pandya looks to drive for a legbreak through cover

review for caught-behind. Stokes has had to convince Root, because Pandya has left this ball outside off. It was an innocuous length ball outside off. There was a sound. There was no appeal from anyone other than Stokes. Ball has brushed the pad. And the lbw is out of question, he's struck outside off. England are out of reviews.
slapped to the the midwicket boundary. That's dropped short on middle and Pandya has middled the heck out of this
full and pushed through fast outside off
tossed up on middle stump, flicked to midwicket
tossed up on off stump, driven to short extra cover
length and just outside off. Defended on the front foot
short ball down leg side, can't get bat on the attempted leg glance
short of a length and in at off stump. Dead-bats it into the pitch off the back foot
length ball pushed down leg side, can't get bat on it again

inside edge trickles past the leg stump and to deep square's right. Kohli driving loosely, well away from the body outside off. He wants a second and Pandya practically scolds his captain as he stands his ground and signals him to get back
length outside off, defended on the front foot
short and very wide outside off, thumped to sweeper's right off the back foot
length ball on off stump, defended solidly to extra cover
short and wide outside off, under-edges to point with the cut
length on leg stump, gets forward and pushes to midwicket
length ball skidding straight on at middle stump, defended off the inside half on the front foot

Adil Rashid has got one to turn after sliding many on straight. What an anti-climax! He doesn't even know how to celebrate, but this is a good ball. It's tossed up, it's loopy, it's got revs. He hasn't bowled too many of these today. This one lands outside off. Kohli looks to crash it through the line to sweeper cover's right. But he isn't to the pitch and with the turn away, he isn't in control. Stokes takes easily to his left at slip. India's captain is gone after another superb knock under tough circumstances
jabs and misses. Stokes curves one in outside off at a length. Hangs his bat out anxiously
short of a length and down leg side. Can't get bat on the whip
length ball outside off, left alone
short and wide outside off, left alone
length ball wide outside off, left alone
length ball just outside off, blocked on the front foot
length on off, pushed to cover

off the mark with a six! Down the track straight away. It's a googly, he's foxed slightly as he looks to go straight. The bat turns in his hand but there's no half-measures in his swing. Clears the straight boundary comfortably
length on off, blocked on the front foot
googly, length and turning away from off stump. Pushed into the off side off the front foot
full toss outside off, whipped to long-on's left
short of a length on the pads, whipped to deep square
inswinging yorker at leg stump. Plants the leg across and jams it into the leg side
bouncer down leg side, lets it go
lenght ball down leg side
length and angled in at leg stump, nudged through midwicket off the front foot
short ball. Very short ball. Easily ducked
short of a length into the hips, nudged through square off the back foot
length ball outside off, left alone
short of a length on leg stump, pushed to midwicket off the back foot
tossed up on off stump, driven to extra cover with the turn
full on off stump, driven to mid-off
short and wide outside off, chopped to sweeper cover
short and wide outside off, cut to deep point
inside edge onto pad. Length ball wide outside off, looks to drive away from the body
short of a length on middle stump, pushed to midwicket from the crease
short of a length on leg stump, clipped to fine leg's left
length ball across off stump, left alone
short and wide outside off, left alone
length ball wide outside off, left alone
short of a length wide outside off. Left alone
length ball jumping away outside off, left alone
short ball wide outside off, left alone

dropped! Jennings puts down a simple lob at third slip. Length ball just outside off, swings in, catches him on the glove after rising up. Brushes the shoulder too to take some pace off it. Jennings sort of...falls into it...and puts it down as he tumbles. Beaten by its slowness?
short of a length on off stump, defended off the back foot
short and wide outside off, left alone
length ball pushed across the corridor, left alone
length ball just outside off, defended solidly on the front foot
length outside off, bat turns as he looks to drive through cover on the up. Manages to get it wide of mid-off for the single
length ball shaping away outside off, left alone
zips past the slip cordon. Anderson has Pandya playing with hard hands at an outswinger. Finds the edge too, but it'll be four
short of a length just outside off, steered towards third slip with an open face
short and rising outside off, left alone
beaten. Fishes outside off to defend on Broad's angle. Broad, as always, gets it to move away from the left hander

length ball into the pads and he calmly clips this to the midwicket fence. Broad can't get this one to move away. Or his attempted double-bluff has failed because he's gone too straight. Either way, Pant's put that away with ease
length ball wide outside off, left alone
beats the outside edge and off stump. Whew. Pant's front leg is on leg stump, there's a gap between bat and pad as he looks to push at this in the corridor. Skids straight through
beaten. Shapes away from the corridor from a good length. Hangs his bat out at it
length ball shaping away from off stump, left alone
length ball swung away in the corridor, dead-batted on the front foot
length on off stump, blocked off the inside half on the front foot
short of a length and swung away outside off, left alone
beaten. Straightens in the corridor, but by a long way. Pandya survives as he looks to defend
past the outside edge. Length ball jumping away from his forward defence

shot. Leans in to a full ball outside off and drives on the up. There's swing away but he's quite a way outside the crease and he doesn't pay for his ambition as a result. Opens the face and gets it through cover point
beaten. Short of a length and shaping away outside off. Hangs his bat out at it
short and wide outside off, left alone
length outside off, defends to point on the front foot
length ball just outside off, blocked into the covers
nearly drags on as he tries to leave. Lets just say leaving doesn't come easy to him. This is swinging away from the corridor but he's late on lifting the bat out of the way. Saved by his back leg
short of a length just outside off, defneded off the back foot
short of a length outside off, left alone
short of a length, deviating a long way away off the pitch. Left alone
length ball at off stump, defended off the back foot
digs out an inswinging yorker. At middle stump, he pushes to midwicket

taken at second slip. Pandya can't hang on. Hard hands. Looks like he wants to dead-bat that, but he's not got the technique right on it. It's a belated withdrawal in the end. Outswinger at a good length outside off, draws him forward and it carries nicely to Buttler
back of a length and seams away outside off, against the angle, Pant simply watches it through to the keeper
similar length and zipping away outside off, no shot again, nice carry through to YJB
good length and angling into the pads, Pant keeps back and works it away through square leg
good length, angling in, swinging in after passing Ashwin, who had left it alone
fuller than a good length and skidding into off stump, Ashwin closes the face as he pushes it defensively to mid-on
back of a length and outside off, Ashwin goes after it and stands with hard hands. The outside edge flies over second slip for four
good length and slanting away outside off from over the wicket, Pant gets right behind the line and blocks it back
back of a length and nipping away outside off, Pant leaves it be
Pant, standing outside the crease, presses forward to dead-bat this full ball on off
good length and angling wide across off stump, Pant shoulders arms again
dug in shorter and angling across off, Pant is a touch late onto the hook and ends up jabbing it onto his pad
there comes the full inswinger from Anderson, Pant plays around his front pad and flicks it off the inside half behind square on the leg side
angling into the hips from round the wicket, picked away fine of long leg, Rashid runs across and hauls the ball in. Off the thigh pad, not the bat
shorter and angling away outside off, Pant can happily let it go
much fuller and attacking off, tighter from Broad, Pant gets forward and pushes it back
good length and skips away outside off, no shot again from Pant, nice carry to YJB again
the rain has juiced up the pitch, but Broad needs to be more consistent with his lines and lengths. Back of a length and swerving down leg, past the reach of Pant's leg-side flick
YJB throws himself to his right to stop this leg-side ball from Broad
good length and slanting in from wide of the crease, Ashwin quietly tucks his bat inside the line and lets it go
fuller, angling in, swinging away a touch, Ashwin angles his bat, plays with soft hands down to gully
good length on a fifth-stump line outside off, wobbles away, Ashwin hangs his bat inside the line again
much fuller and moves away outside off, Ashwin opens the face again, plays with soft hands, and guides it away between backward point and gully
shorter and on off, Ashwin jumps back and punches on the up to mid-off

edged between third slip and gully. You can find the edge if you go fuller outside off and find a hint of outswing, Ashwin jabs and gets away. Three boundaries for Ashwin - all in the third-man region
Broad goes shorter and gets it to zip away outside off, Pant lets it harmlessly go through to YJB
back of a length and curving away against the angle, left alone
much fuller and swinging away outside off, too wide to draw a shot

Broad has Pant playing on. Nice and full outside off, asks Pant to chase after it. Pant obliges, chases after a drive with his feet pinned to the crease and watches an inside edge rattle his stumps. Broad gives the debutant a send-off
full inswinger, shapes in from outside off, Ishant manages to poke it to point
another sharp inswinger, Ishant's head falls over to the off side as he squeezes this away to square leg
back of a length and wide outside off, Ashwin now flashes in the channel... and misses
back of a length and angling into a solid punch to mid-off
shorter and outside off,Ashwin leans back and punches to the left of cover
back of a length, angling in, then snaking away outside off, Ishant does well. He does not follow the ball and instead tucks his bat inside the line
fuller and attacking off stump, Ishant jams it to the off side for a single

Pope at fourth slip drops it. Good length, angling in, shaping away late, Ashwin has a defensive push at it and edges it low, Pope dives away to his left and gets a hand to it but the ball pops out in the end. It went quickly to him, such chances stick.... or they don't
pitched up and outside off, forward and driven to the covers
Ashwin thrusts his front pad outside the line and misses this inswinger, impact outside, however
back of a length and skids back in at off stump, Ashwin loosens his grip, checks his punch, and plays it back to the bowler

sharp inswinger from Broad, floors Ashwin's middle stump. Pretty full and hooping back in on middle, after starting outside off, Ashwin wants to flick it away to the leg side, but the ball sneaks through the gate, and knocks out his middle stump. Two wickets in seven balls for Broad
pitched up and outside off, Shami reaches out for the ball and swishes it through the covers, the ball plugs in the deep
good length, angling in, straightening away outside off, Ishant plays for the incoming angle and is beaten on the outside
back of a length on off stump, Shami has a leg-side mow at it... and misses
pitched up and attacking the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
wide of the crease, good length and slanting in at off stump, Shami tightly blocks it back to the bowler
Shami goes for another leg-side mow and ends up skewing a catch to Broad at mid-on. Back of a length and just a shade outside off, Shami clears his front leg and skies this slog
Anderson wraps up India for 329. Back of a length, angling into leg stump, then nips away late to square Bumrah up and hit the top of middle stump
good length and slanting away outside off, Cook dangles his bat out and edges it to the left of Kohli at slip and right of Rahane at gully. Kohli dives but can't stop it
back of a length and pushed down the leg side, Cook can't connect with the flick
full and straight, Cook moves forward and flicks straight to midwicket
back of a length and on the hips, Cook hops and tucks a single to long leg
very full, angling in, tailing in from round the wicket, Jennings closes his bat-face and chips a leading edge past Shami's right
Pant throws himself to his right but can't collect it down the leg side. Back of a length and swerving down the leg side to the boundary
back of a length and straightens outside off, bounces, off the shoulder off the bat between Rahul at third slip and Rahane at gully
short and slanting into the hips, tucked to the leg side
short and angling into a defensive push to mid-on
short and angling into the hips, turned to square leg off the back foot
back of a length and skidding into middle, 142ks, Cook hastily jabs it out to the covers
Bumrah isn't going any fuller, short and shoved down the leg side, Pant moves to his right but the ball pops out
pitched up and angling in at off, forward and solidly pushed back to Shami
back of a length and outside off, no shot
back of a length and outside off, left alone, Pant crouches and takes it rather awkwardly
back of a length and angling into middle, defended back
much fuller and Shami gets it to seam away outside off, Jennings hangs his bat out and is beaten on the outside
back of a length and slanting in at off stump, blocked back to the bowler off the front foot
Bumrah keeps it short and strays on the hips of Cook, clipped to midwicket
shortish and skids back in at 143ks, rushes the batsman, pings the back thigh and rolls down to the cordon
back of a length and fizzes in to ping the thigh pad, 144ks
good length on middle, turned to short midwicket
and finally Bumrah gets it fuller and outside off, tapped to point
back of a length and Bumrah brings it back in from around the wicket, Jennings plays around it and might have snicked it. He weathers the lbw shout
back of a length and outside off, Cook goes after it and belatedly tucks his bat inside the line
short and wide outside off, Cook goes after it again, lashing a square cut off the back foot
short and angling in at off, Cook goes on the back foot, gets behind the line, and defends
short and outside off, chops at it and sends an inside edge to fine leg
short and outside off again, Jennings sizes it up and punches it square through the off side for a four of his own. India's seamers need to get it fuller
back of a length and angling away in the  corridor, Jennings keeps his bat inside the line and lets it go
fuller on middle and leg, 142ks, Cook hastily jabs it to the leg side
back of a length and comes in from outside off, but does not threaten off, Cook judges it well and lets it go
short on middle, Cook hops and fends it away towards mid-on
a bit too full and outside off, Cook presses forward and laces a drive through the covers
shorter and angling in at top of off, Cook leaps and steers it off the face to point
perfectly-pitched on middle, full and keeps Cook to a defensive push, but Bumrah's front foot has strayed
full and swings away a bit outside off, solidly driven to the covers
short and outside off, Jennings gets on top of it and fluently punches through the covers
good length and on middle, pushed up to the covers
back of a length and slanting away wide outside off, ignored
pitched further up and nibbling away outside off - that's the length, Shami - no shot
back of a length and angling across off, Jennings camps back and fiddles. The outside edge streaks away past fourth slip
short and angling away outside off, guided wide of Dhawan at point
tossed up outside off, not any turn, forward and driven uppishly through cover
arm ball from Ashwin, finds the inside edge that rolls away to short leg
pushed through on the pads, the batsman hangs back and flicks it through square leg
back of a length and spins away slightly, defended with soft hands to slip off the back foot
flatter and faster on middle, tapped to short cover
tossed up slower and higher on middle, patted to mid-on off the front foot
fuller, angling in towards off, then seaming away outside off, Cook hangs his bat out in the corridor and is beaten on the outside edge
back of a length and angled down the leg side, Cook does not make contact with a flick
back of a length and straightens outside off, Cook presses forward and plays with soft hands to backward point
short on the hips, tucked away through square leg
too full and straight now, Cook happily drives through midwicket for three
back of a length and slanting away outside off, ignored
full and shaping away just outside off, defended into the covers off the front foot
length ball wide outside off, left alone
length ball shaping away from off stump, blocked solidly on the front foot

sliced to the point boundary with a big reach away from the body. It's length and shaping away from wide outside off. Opens the face to make sure he can get it into the grround. But that's a dangerous shot
short of a length and wide outside off, left alone
length and in at leg stump. Defended to mid-on off the front foot
short of a length just outside off, defended off the back foot
short and slanted across off stump, stabbed to cover off the back foot
short on off stump, defended off the back foot
short of a length just outside off, angled-bat tap to cover off the back foot
short ball sliding across him. Thinks of the cut but decides to withdraw the bat
short on off stump, defended into point off the back foot
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
short of a length and wide outside off, left alone
thick outside edge as he opens the face and offers soft hands to get this past the slip cordon. Good line from Ishant. Curves it away from the corridor, back of a length and squared him up

dropped. Pujara has put one down at first slip. It's a straighforward catch at knee height. Pant is diving across to his left and in front of Pujara, but that should be taken. Another good ball from Ishant. Swinging it away after angling it in. Cook stays on the back foot as he jabs at this in the corridor. Pujara grabs at it as he crouches low but can't hold on to his right
length on off stump, blocked into the covers

he's got him! What a wonderful over this has been from Ishant Sharma. Kept swinging it away from the corridor and got it full enough for Cook to keep playing. He's poking away from the body this time and it's a thin edge that goes straight through to the debutant keeper

and another! Tentative from Jennings against a short and wide ball. Instinctive jab and his decision to withdraw the bat comes too late. It's kissed the edge and flown wide to Pant's left. He's skipped across comfortably and taken his second Test catch. It's almost a repeat of India's innings from yesterday. India have gained the momentum now.
short and wide outside off, left alone
length outside off, leans in and slices to backward point
short of a length outside off, tapped to point off the back foot
that's handsome. On the up and not close to the body, but he's in full control. Sheer balance. It's a length ball outside off and he gets his weight into it as he punches to the cover boundary
inside edge. Pope caught halfway into his cover drive this time. Bumrah angles it into the corridor and that gap between bat and pad has nearly cost him this time
firm on the front foot. This is full outside off, he gets to the pitch and drives neatly between bowler and mid-off
leading edge as he closes the face too early on the flick. It's there for the flick though, full and into leg stump
length ball way down leg side. Can't get bat on this
length on off stump, defended from deep in the crease
length ball swung in at off stump, tapped down the pitch
short of a length just outside off, pushed to mid-off off the back foot
top edge safely down towards fine leg. Short ball outside off but angled into him. He's very late on the hook. Tough to play Bumrah short bowling if you've never seen him before
length on off stump, pushed down the pitch
short and rising outside off, left alone
short of a length just outside off, defended into the slip cordon off the back foot
short of a length and in at leg stump. Poked into the leg side off the back foot
short of a length on off stump, defended off the back foot
full on middle stump, tapped into the leg side off the front foot
thick outside edge as he looks to drive. It's full on off stump, he brings down an angled bat on it and it rolls out to point
length ball slanted down leg side, can't connect on the leg glance
onto the back thigh off the inside edge. Root looks to defend against an inswinger in the corridor
lbw appeal turned down. A big inswinger. Hooping in sharply after starting from middle. Strikes Root on middle and leg as he falls over trying to flick. That's going down
length on off stump, punched to mid-off on the up
short of a length and thumped into the pitch. Jags away but Pope behind it to defend off the back foot
short of a length just outside off, left alone
short of a length and in at off stump. Defended off the back foot
full and in at leg stump. Jabbed to mid-on with the angle
cuts through him! That's a mean delviery. Wide of the crease length ball, pitching outside off, zipping sharply back past the inside edge to climb over off stump. Pope was looking to drive that
short of a length on off, defended into the covers
length ball outside off, opens the face and drives to backward point
short ball down leg side, gets back and helps it fine with a horizontal bat. Ishant doesn't get the bouncer to rise higher than hip height
nicely punched. Short of a length and outside off. He gets behind and plays late to jab it through cover. But Pandya has done superbly. Sprints vigorously from point and pulls it back in with a slide
length and in at off stump, defended doff the back foot
length and in at off stump, punched to mid-off on the up
short ball swung in at the body. Gets behind and takes the bottom hand off as he drops this in front of short leg
short and that exaggerated angle helps Bumrah bring this one back in towards off, Root gets behind the line and plays it back to the bowler
edged, and another England batsman threads the cordon. Full, angling in from wide of the crease, straightens a touch, a thin edge runs away between Pant, who was wrong-footed, and first slip
back of a length and angling in outside off, ignored
back of a length and angling into a defensive push back to Bumrah
back of a length, slanting in from outside off, Root plays inside the line and allows himself to get beaten
pitched further up on a fourth-stump line, he presses forward and drives to mid-off

taken down leg side and Pope doesn't stick around for the review. Short of a length on the pads, swinging on with the angle. Pope tickles it fine but Pant has lunged to his left down leg side to complete a sharp catch. hHis early step into the leg side helps him this time
short ball well down leg side, allows it to pass
shoulders arms and it thumps into his thigh guard. Big inswinger again, banged in short of a length
short of a length on leg stump, whipped to square leg on the bounce
length ball on leg stump, goes further down. Left alone
length ball swung in at middle stump, blocked solidly on the front foot
short of a length and into the corridor. Left alone

short of third slip who sticks out a left hand but can't stop it from sneaking through. Kohli there, parrying it past second slip. Length ball straightens in the corridor as Root looks to defend with soft hands
rises past the outside edge. Short of a length ball angled in towards off. No way you're leaving that when you spot the early trajectory. But it cuts past the bat as he looks to defend it
short of a length outside off, left alone
short of a length on leg stump, flicked to short leg
length and in at off stump, defended off the back foot
short ball down leg side, left alone
falls short of backward square leg. Length ball climbing into Bairstow who stabs in front of his body and gets a thick inside edge
in control this time. Overpitched inswinger on the pads. Clips it, aerially, through the empty midwicket area
length on off stump. Looks like an offcutter. Bairstow picks it late and jabs anxiously to point off the front foot
length ball swung in at middle stump. Tapped to midwicket on the front foot
into the pads. Swinging a bit too much for Ishant right now. Gets it full but it's past the bat and into his pads
length on leg stump, nudged to long leg off the inside half
back thigh as he looks to get back at this short of a length ball
length just outside off, poked to cover off the back foot
bouncer outside off. Allows it to pass
length ball wide outside off, left alone
short and wide outside off, reaches out and rolls his wrists over this cut
short of a length onto the pads. Deep in the crease and nicely tucked to deep square's right
short and very wide outside off, chases and can't connect with the cut
short of a length on off, climbs on top of it to defend
length on off stump, punched to mid-off on the up
short of a length and in at the hip. Can't get his angled bat on this, cops it on the body
length ball hooping in at leg stump. Cops it on the pad as he gets on the front foot
short of a length on off stump, defended solidly on the back foot

has that carried to second slip? KL Rahul has certainly celebrated like it has. Hard to think the soft signal will be anything other than out, given that. Yes, soft signal is out...it is a legal delivery...oh this will be close! There is possibility of there being a bounce and he can only possibly have fingertips under it...third umpire rules he has fingertips under it! Joe Root cannot believe it. Neither can the crowd. By the rules, that is the correct decision - there wasn't conclusive evidence to overturn an out decision. But it wouldn't have been overturned if it was given not out in the first place. It's that soft signal debate lurking again. That was short of a length and straightening in the corridor as Root defended inside the line. Pandya bowled from wide of the crease. Root never looked convinced, not even before the replay was taken. He was marking his guard as the review happened.
full outside off, gets forward and drives through cover
short of a length slanted across off, left alone
length and wide outside off, left alone
past the inside edge. Pushes for the one that angles away from him, but this nips back into the corridor
short and wide outside off, chucks his hands at it and gets it to the wide third man boundary
leaves without covering off. This narrowly goes past from a good length
big lbw appeal but that has probably struck him outside leg, let alone the big swing on it. Can't connect on the flick
clipped wide of square leg. Shami goes around and angles it into Stokes, short of a length. He leans in, gets it slightly aerial, but it's safe
length ball wide outside off, left alone
length ball in at off stump, defended off the back foot
short of a length and into his thigh as he looks to glance this
length ball swung very wide outside off
length outside off, left alone
good length, curving away from off stump. Blocked solidly on the front foot
nice line. Very good line from Pandya. Swinging marginally away from off stump. Bairstow leaves again with the off stump exposed
short of a length on off stump, pushed through point with soft hands
length ball wide outside off, left alone

review for lbw. Stokes walks down the pitch at a ball slanted across off stump. Looks like it will miss off stump on first glance..no, it's clipping off but that'll be umpire's call. Whew. So close. A good review call from Pandya. Stokes was looking to whip it through midwicket and was trapped in front of off stump.
short ball in the corridor, arches back and allows it to pass
length outside off, punched to mid-off on the front foot
inside edge rolls into the slip cordon. Length ball outside off, jabs at it ad gets it onto his front pad
length just outside off, defended on the front foot
beaten. Short and wide outside off, slashes on the front foot and can't get bat on it
length ball curving in at leg stump, flicked to fine leg
edged and down to third man. Pandya is quietly sneaking in a testing spell. Length ball swinging away from off. Bairstow looks to drill it through extra cover and is not in control
beaten. That full outswinger just outside off again. Looks to jab at and this isn't too far from off stump either
leaves it alone. Close to off again, but he's counted on it to swing away and covered off to let it pass
length ball, a shade wide outside off. Left alone
full ball well down leg side. Pant dives a long, long way to his left to stop that
full ball very wide outside off, opens his stance up and bludgeons it to the point boundary
short and wide outside off, left alone

got him at second slip! No doubt this time. KL Rahul pouches it at knee height. Stokes caught poking with hard hands outside off as one straightens after angling in. Good bowling, not very confident batting. This looks bleak for England now

falls short of Kohli. Third slips have struggled to get under catches all through this game. Buttler pokes well in front of his body at a length ball. It doesn't rise too much and Kohli stops on the bounce
length ball wide outside off, left alone
off the inside edge and past square leg. Length ball curving in at middle stump. Hangs the bat in front of the body again
short and wide outside off, left alone

What a ball, Hardik Pandya! What a spell, Hardik Pandya! Perfectly-pitched ball, full, angling in towards middle and off, makes Bairstow play, the late seam movement squares him up, and finds the outside edge. This is held comfortably by Rahul at second slip. From 54 for 0, England have fallen to 110 for 6
Pandya goes wide of the crease and slants one in the corridor, Woakes plays inside the line and is beaten
full and nibbles away outside off, Woakes drives with an angled bat towards backward point. Rahane tumbles to his left at backward point, but the ball sneaks through his hands
overpitched and outside off, Woakes leans into it and drills a drive through the covers
back of a length and angling in at off, the batsman covers up in defence

Pant takes a step to the leg side, then stretches out his right glove, the ball just about sticks in his webbing even as it keeps swerving away from his reach. Umpire Erasmus raises his finger and gives Woakes out caught behind. Woakes challenges the on-field out decision. Bouncer aimed at the arm-pit, cramps the batsman for room. Woakes still dares to hook, he only tickles it off the bat to Pant
too full on off, Butter shows the full face of the ball and drives it handsomely past the left of Shami. So easy on the eye
full, glided behind point
short on the body, tucks up Rashid for room, fended off fine on the leg side. Gloved away for four
lifter outside off, gets big on Rashid and beats the hook
nice and full on off, Rashid ventures forward and drops it defensively to the leg side
on a length and outside off, Rashid chases after it and drives on the up through the covers

Four wickets for Pandya, five catches for Pant. Pant dives to his right and snaffles this edge. Shastri and Bangar are up on their feet, applauding their boys. Full, angling in just a shade outside off, and nibbling away, Rashid has a defensive push at it and nicks it behind to the debutant. England's procession continues...
very full on middle from over the wicket, Broad sits back and keeps out the hat-trick ball
full on middle and leg, played back off the back foot again
fuller and outside off, Pandya asks Broad to drive, Broad says 'nah'

Pandya bags his maiden five-wicket haul in Test cricket. He holds the red ball aloft and celebrates. Broad thinks about a review but decides against it. Plumb. This is full and straight, swings in, 142ks, Broad falls over a leg-side flick and is pinned in front of middle. This is some spell from Pandya. Five wickets inside five overs
pitched up and nipping away outside off, Anderson swishes his bat out of the way
back of a length on middle, worked to the right of mid-on. And yes Buttler doesn't expose Anderson
back of a length and outside off, driven uppishly to cover
skewed over Rahane at cover. Good length and angling in, Buttler flicks early, closes the face and spoons a leading edge over the infield and England avoid the follow-on
full on off, right in Buttler's swinging radar, he stretches out and hoists it over Shami's head
Buttler has T20'd it into the stands beyond midwicket! Just short of a good length and outside off, he swivels on the back foot and sends it clattering over the boundary
back of a length and outside off, Buttler skips back again, lustily clubbed away to the midwicket fence
drifting down the leg side, away from the reach of the glance
full and angling across off, poked away to square leg
full on middle, tip and run to cover. Over to you Jos, says Jimmy
full and angling into a leg-side flick through midwicket. They hare across for the second
back of a length and swings away wide outside off, no shot
shuffles across and steals a single in front of midwicket. Buttler steals the strike too
full and outside off, skewered through midwicket
back of a length and floated down leg, Buttler flicks and misses
back of a length and outside off, smeared away to sweeper cover. Jadeja, who's on as a sub, swoops down on the ball
near yorker, swings down the leg side, as Buttler clears his front leg and does not connect with his leg-side slog
good length and angling in, tucked to the right of midwicket
Ishant comes from around the wicket and straightens a full ball past the outside edge of Anderson
short, wide, slapped away to deep point. Buttler denies the single
back of a length and outside off, drilled to wide long-off
short and skidding into a clip to the leg side
back of a length and outside off, jabbed away to deep cover
1000 Test runs for Butttler. Stabbed away to wide long-on
short and spits up at Anderson's body, he hops and fends it off, does not carry to short leg
pitched up and outside off, right in Buttler's swinging arc, he backs away outside leg and smites it over the long-off boundary. Muscled away
short and outside off, swivels on the back foot and slugs a pull to deep midwicket
slower ball outside off, finishes wider than a set of stumps outside off, Buttler throws his hands at it... and misses
full and wide outside off, reaches out for it and carves a drive to the covers
short and outside off, laced away to sweeper cover
full on middle, hangs back and pokes through the point region, Anderson draws cheers from the crowd
dug in short and outside off, rushes Buttler into a hook, he top-edges it, does not carry to Shami at long leg
Buttler toe-ends a catch to Thakur, the substitute, at long-on. Back of a length and outside off, Buttler has a roundhouse swipe at it but only miscues it to the deep
length on leg stump, gets deep in the crease and turns this through midwicket
flowing drive from Dhawan. It's very wide and swinging away from off stump, but Dhawan stretches out and makes a nice connection as he gets this wide of mid-off
lbw appeal is turned down. Anderson brings this back in, but it hits Dhawan high on the front leg
full inswinger down leg side can't get the flick away
overpitched and wide outside off, doesn't go after it
leading edge past third slip. Full ball on off stump. He closes the face on it to try and drive through midwicket but that jags away and third slip's dive won't get him there
full and in at the stumps. Squeezed into the leg side off the inside half. Head falls over into the off side as he plays that
inside edge and onto front pad as he gets forward to defend this outside off
length ball and into the pads. Nudged to square leg off the back foot
short of a length onto the pads, nudged to to fine leg
big inswinger into the pads. Allows it to come on and clips it to fine leg
leading edge over cover. Broad goes around the wicket straight away and gets this full ball to swing away from middle stump. Dhawan closes the face early again as he looks to go leg side
that rolls through to the square leg boundary. An uppish flick, deliberately lifted over square leg. It was on middle and didn't swing away, so a safe option for Rahul
outswinger from a good length outside of, left alone
length and shaping away from off stump. Closes the face and drops it into the leg side
length and swung away from off stump. Blocked on the front foot
short of a length on off stump, runs it behind square on the off side off the back foot
inside edge as he looks for an ugly slash through the covers. Outswinger that he hasn't reached the pitch to. Playing well away from the body. Trickles down to fine leg
short of a length on off stump, defended towards point off the back foot
length ball slanting through just outside off. Jab-and-withdraw from Rahul. It sails through to the keeper
thick outside edge runs past third slip. He was looking to play that into the turf, and hence had soft hands. It was in the channel, he got it to third man
more in control this time as he gets behind the length ball in the corridor. Opens the face at the right time and gets it down to third man. Stokes sprints and pulls it back in
slashed over point. That's not terribly far from Stokes, who is a touch deep at backward point. But he heas cleared him. Short and wide, and once again, no intention to keep it down from Rahul
length and in at off stump, blocked on the front foot
short of a length and curving away from outside off, left alone
length ball swung away outside off, left alone
lbw shout turned down. Wasn't a bad shout. Length ball catches him on the back foot in front of off stump. Not too much interest from England. They probably reckon it's going over
length on off stump, defended into the covers
short of a length and wide outside off, left alone
short and wide outside off, left alone
full and late swing into the pads. Hurriedly turns it to fine leg
short and wide outside off, left alone
length outside off, pushed to point off the front foot
beaten. Great ball. Shapes away marginally, jumps up a lot and surprises Dhawan who is looking to defend on the back foot
short of a length and shaped away from off. Left alone
length on off stump, defended off the back foot
length ball shaping away on off stump, defended to point off the back foot
length ball starting on leg, some swing away. Poked into the leg side off the front foot
short of a length on middle, pushed down the pitch off the back foot
good shot. Overpitched on off stump, stands tall and punches regally past the bowler

sweet! KL Rahul has found batting confidence from his fielding confidence by the looks of it. A classy punch off the back foot through cover. Solidly on top of the bounce of this short of a length ball outside off and a high elbow as he makes connection
length just outside off, defended off the back foot
thick edge down to third man. Dhawan finally chases one outside off and it brings him runs. Outswinger at a length wide outside off, chucks his bat it
short of a length outside off, left alone
length ball just outside off, left alone
short of a length outside off, steers it to third man with an open face
length outside off, gap between bat and pad as he gets forward to defend. Gets it right off the middle though
length ball wide outside off, plants the front leg outside off and pummels this through point on the up
length ball in at the stumps, pushed to mid-off on the front foot
