just past point as he cuts in the air. Short ball in the corridor, not a lot of room for him. But he goes after it anyway with the cut. Pope gets a fingertip to it
length ball slanted across off stump, left alone
big appeal as Dhawan is rapped on the pads on the back foot again. Short of a length and hitting him in front of leg. That's probably pitched outside leg
length ball on middle stump, pushed to midwicket off the front foot
trapped on the pad again. Stifled appeal this time. Length ball rising at leg stump and he can't get the flick away

length ball in at leg stump, dropped pitch side on the leg side and Dhawan collides with Stokes who is looking to get across to the ball. No damage done in the end and they shake hands at the end of it all
full and in at off stump, blocked on the front foot
length ball in at off stump, mistimed drive down the pitch on the up
bouncer at the chest, hooks along the floor and gets it out to deep square leg
short of a length just outside off, opens the face and gets it in front of the slips
inside edge flies past Bairstow's outstretched left hand. Went over the stumps too. Length ball angled in at off stump and he left that big gap again
length on leg stump, flicked to deep square
full on leg stump, poked down the pitch off the front foot
length ball climbing up at the pads. Deflects into the covers as he misses on the flick
short of a length and slanted across the corridor. Left alone
length ball on leg stump, dropped in front of square leg with soft hands
raps the pad, but this is going down with the angle. Length ball coming in at leg stump and he's tried to whip that away too hard
length ball in at middle stump, flicked to deep square's right

through him! Another Rahul-Dhawan stand stops at 60. He's missed a full straight one this time. Loose shot, no feet. Looks to drive through the line with hard hands. But this angles in from an off stump line, catches his pad and deflects onto off stump
short ball wide outside off, left alone
short of a length on the hips, hangs back in the crease and tickles it fine
length ball on leg stump, pushed to mid-on's right off the front foot
thick outside edge as he defends inside the line. It's a length ball angled in at him and he defends with soft hands as this straightens
short of a length on leg stump, pushed behind square on the leg side off the hips
length ball shaping away outside off, left alone
length ball swung away wide outside off, left alone
length on off stump, defended into the covers
short of a length just outside off, left alone
oh well bowled. Goes wide, lands it on a length, makes him play and then takes it past the outside edge
short of a length and slanted into the corridor. Left alone
thick outside edge down to third man. Length ball just outside off, soft-handed prod outside off
length ball at off stump, defended off the front foot
solid. Full inswinger from Stokes again, similar to the Rahul delivery. But Pujara has his feet sorted, and his bat swing is nice and straight too. Drilled past the non-striker
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
another top shot from Pujara. Overpitched on middle, keeps his shape, gets his legs sufficiently out of the way to make room and clip this deftly past mid-on
short of a length just outside off, defended to point off the back foot
short of a length just outside off, poked into the off side off the back foot
short of a length outside off, steered to backward point off the back foot

nicely done. More leg stump overpitched stuff from England, and more punishment. There's a James Milner lookalike in the crowd who isn't impressed with them. Dhawan allows this to come on and duly sends it to the midwicket boundary
short of a length just outside off, tapped down the pitch off the back foot
short of a length on leg stump, deflected behind square off the thigh guard as he looks to play the glance
good length and spinning into the pads, Dhawan goes on the back foot and whips a single behind square
tossed up, full on off stump, Pujara moves forward and dead-bats it
shorter and breaks away outside off, Pujara waits for the ball to turn, plays late, cutting it off the back foot past lone slip
short and spins away again, this one bounces more and beats the back-cut
looped up on off, presses forward and smothers it
rank long-hop outside off, Pujara has ample time to jump back and slam it straight of mid-on for four
full and angling away outside off, Dhawan inside-edges a drive to fine leg
wide of the crease, angling into a solid defence to leg side
wide of the crease, again, good length and slanting in, Pujara plays close to his body and defends
bouncer, sails through to YJB outside off, Pujara shelves the hook
back of a length and angling into a defensive push to mid-on
banged in short on off, fended back to the bowler
floated up on the pads, worked away to deep square leg
full and spins away outside off, Pujara opens the bat-face and drives to sweeper cover off the front foot
tossed on off, forward and dabbed to midwicket
half-tracker outside off, Dhawan rocks back and only pulls a single to deep midwicket
slides on outside off, no shot from Pujara
full-toss on middle, a twirl of the wrists sends the ball to deep midwicket
Cook's day gets worse. He drops a catch at first slip. Good length and swerving away outside off, squares up Dhawan, draws the outside edge. Cook moves low to his right but shells a simple catch
short and outside off, punched on the up to the covers
full on a fifth-stump line outside off, Pujara watches it through to the keeper
wide of the crease, but this length ball holds its line outside off, nothing doing from Pujara
shorter and outside off, Pujara jumps back and chops to point
wide of the crease, clipped with the sharp incoming angle to midwicket
pushed through on the leg stump, Dhawan rolls out a sweep and fetches a single to long leg
looped up on off, driven hard to mid-off for one
tossed on middle, dead-batted to the leg side
glanced off the pads behind square on the leg side
short and spins in from outside off, leans back and chops to point
full and dangled outside off, opens the face and runs to point
back of a length and outside off, leans back and punches firmly to the covers
bowled from wide of the crease, angling in and snaking past the outside edge as Pujara plays inside the line of it
slanting into the pads, deflected to square leg
full on off, drilled back to Woakes off the front foot
good length and angling across off, left alone
back of a length on off, Dhawan plays with soft hands, dropping the ball square on the off side
Pujara uses his feet and drives straight to cover
pitches outside off, Pujara kicks it away with his pad
full on off, dead-batted to the leg side
floated up on off, slower through the air, blocked to leg side again
shorter and spins away, allowing Pujara to jump back and force it through the covers
full and spinning in from round the wicket, Dhawan keeps it out
back of a length and into the pads, clipped to long leg
on the pads again, Dhawan now clips a four to fine leg. Rashid doesn't pull out a dive in the deep, and Woakes isn't pleased one bit
keeps bowling on the pads, tucked straight to Rashid this time
back of a length and angling into a defensive push to mid-on
wide of the crease, Woakes kisses the pitch and gets it to float through to the keeper, left alone
fuller than a good length and carries low to the keeper, left alone
short and spinning in, tickled fine

Dhawan uses his feet, Rashid pulls his length back and gets it to break away. Dhawan does not read the googly, and is stranded near the middle of the pitch. YJB takes the bails off. Dhawan leaves with 44 - his highest Test score in England
looped up on off, bunted back, Rashid half-stops the ball
dragged down on the pads, Kohli responds with a back-foot whip to deep square
short and turns sharply outside off, bounces to boot, left alone
pushed through flatter on middle, turned to the leg side for one
back of a length and angling down the leg side
wide of the crease, angling into a flick to long leg
back of a length on middle, Kohli gets inside the line and works it away to long leg
tucked to fine leg
forward and driven to mid-off
bouncer outside off, Pujara ducks under it
back of a length and slanting in on middle, defended back
back of a length and outside off, Kohli stays beside the line and punches it away to deep point
back of a length on off, jabbed to the off side off the back foot
clipped off the back foot to deep midwicket
back of a length and outside off, left alone
full and outside off, Kohli inside-edges a drive to the leg side
bouncer on leg or outside leg, Pujara shelves the hook again. Two men in the deep on the leg side waiting for the hook
sharp short ball on leg, Pujara ducks under again
the short-ball attack continues, Pujara keeps ducking under these
short and on the hips, glanced to long leg
bangs another one does Stokes, this time Kohli sways away
Kohli rides the bounce of this short one on middle and leg and pulls to fine leg
good length and outside off, tip and run to point
short and outside off, left alone
back of a length and wobbles away outside off, no shot
short and bounces over Pujara's cut in the corridor
back of a length and angling into a push to short midwicket
back of a length, left alone outside off
short and up at the hips. Gets on top of the bounce and whips it to deep square's right
bouncer outside off, left alone
withdraws from the hook. Shapes to play it, and does really well to drop it pitch side, because this has made contact with the bat so he didn't have too much time
bouncer over his left shoulder, takes it on this time and can't connect
bouncer outside off this time, left alone
short and outside off, hops and fends to gully
good length and plugging away outside off, left alone
full on off, pressed to the covers
left alone outside off again
full on off, defended back
good length, angling in, and swinging away so very late. Pujara does well not to chase at it. Instead, he plays inside the line and allows himself to get beaten in the channel
banged in short on off, Kohli jumps and fends it back to Stokes
bouncer outside off, Kohli lets it fly through to YJB
short and outside off, Kohli sways his upper body out of the way
short and slanting away outside off, Kohli evades it
here comes the full ball on middle, Kohli presses forward and taps it back to Stokes
good length and angling across off stump, Kohli swishes his bat out of the way and rounds out the day
short of a length and just outside off. Solidly behind the line to defend off the back foot
jumps up at him this time from a similar length. Just short of a length and past the outside edge after straightening off the pitch
short of a length on off, defended to point off the back foot
short and up at hip height on off stump. Nudged to cover off the back foot
short and in at leg stump. Pushed to midwicket from the crease
length ball outside off, left alone as it jags away
full on middle stump, flicked to mid-on with a short stride
length ball in at middle and off, gently clipped to short midwicket
length in the corridor, blocked on the front foot to point
nicely placed. Length ball slanted in at him and this time he holds the stride back and allows it a little more distance so he can whip it wide of Anderson at short midwicket
length ball shaping away off the pitch outside off, left alone
length ball with some curve away, wide outside off. Left alone
whew! That's vicious! Jags back in late and keeps coming in as it climbs at Pujara's mid-riff. He sways away and it sails over off stump
oh beautiful. This one draws Pujara forward and moves away from his bat. Unplayable. Angled in at off and he looks to defend for that line
pings off the inside half as he pushes slightly outside off on the front foot. That moved back in off the seam
cops it on the back thigh. Gets forward to this and it lifts back in past the inside edge
short of a length just outside off, defended off the back foot
jabs and beaten. Excellent over by Anderson. Gets another one up outside off after angling a few in. Gets the batsman to play and cuts it past the outside edge
length on off stump, watchfully defended on the front
full and in at leg stump, allows it to come on and clips it wide of mid-on
short of a length and some late swing away. Too wide to make him play
short of a length just outside off, defended off the back foot
length and in at middle stump, dropped into the leg side with soft hands
length on middle stump, gets forward and defends off the inside half of the bat
length ball down leg side, looks to flick but that's snuck past his bat
short of a length on leg stump, whipped to long leg
short of a length and slanted into the corridor, left alone
length outside off, left alone
short of a length on off stump, defended off the back foot
short and wide outside off, left alone
length ball with some shape away wide outside off, left alone
stays low. But he manages to get bat on it. Short of a length ball skids through at knee height as he gets on the back foot
length ball just outside off, defended on the front foot
nicely timed. Doesn't go hard at it. Allows it complete it's path away from him and taps it wide of mid-off with a half-stride
length ball wide outside off, left alone on the front foot
short of a length outside off, left alone
driven through midwicket. Poor ball, easy runs. Full and into his toes and the wrists are at the ready from Pujara
length ball in at off stump, defends on the front foot and it deflects onto his back boot off the inside half
length and wide outside off, left alone
bouncer in the channel, ducks under it
oh so close. The old Morne Morkel - so unplayable, it won't get you a wicket. Tiny deviation away in the corridor after Pujara is drawn forward and past the outside edge
short of a length and wide outside off, left alone

leading edge as he uses hard hands and closes the bat face on this. It's on off stump but he's looking for the flick because Woakes has created the illusion that this is coming into him. It shapes away and it dribbles through point
length ball wide outside off, left alone
angled into him and he cops it on the body as it jags past his inside edge
away from the body to this, but a nice looking drive right off the middle. Length ball swinging away wide outside off. finds cover
short and wide outside off, left alone
short and wide, left alone
short of a length on leg stump, defended into the leg side off the back foot

dropped. Another one for Buttler. Low to his left and a lazy attempt really. Goes down slow and one-handed. Anderson finally gets one to catch the edge after straightening in the corridor. Pujara defending away from the body. He should have got two hands on that
short of a length just outside off, defended off the back foot
length ball wide outside off, left alone
short of a length on middle stump, defended off the back foot
length ball wide outside off, left alone
short of a length outside off, opens the face and runs it to deep backward point
short of a length and down leg side, can't get the leg glance away
loose from Pujara. Not a big enough stride to be playing one so far away, if indeed he wants to be playing. Two minds, it appears. It's a length ball shaping way and he's beaten
